yViSvysiwj0.title: Every Episode of Gay Science | Collection 2 | Rob Anderson
yViSvysiwj0.author: Rob Anderson
yViSvysiwj0.description:
Get the new Gay Science Book! http://geni.us/GayScience

Gay Science is a series that asks the question “Why do the gays?” I take queer stereotypes and explain them scientifically with true 100% real science. This is a collection of every episode from the first collection (2020) of Gay Science and Gay Anthropology. In this video we'll answer:

Why are gay men terrible drivers?
How does gaydar work?
Why do gay men run like that?
Gay Uncles, explained
Why do gay parents raise happier kids?
Why do gay relationships feel longer?
Why do gay people age better?
What is bi panic?
Why do gay men choose difficult vacation spots?
Why are gay men always running late?
Astrology Gays, explained
Why do gay people either love or hate brunch?
Why do gay men talk like that?
Why are gay sons the moms favorite?

Buy Gay Science merch here!
